CODE - 200 OK

Docker-Content-Digest: <digest>

CODE - PUT /v2/<name>/blobs/uploads/<uuid>?digest=<digest>
Content-Length: <size of layer>
Content-Type: application/octet-stream

<Layer Binary Data>

CODE - PATCH /v2/<name>/blobs/uploads/<uuid>
Content-Length: <size of chunk>
Content-Range: <start of range>-<end of range>
Content-Type: application/octet-stream

<Layer Chunk Binary Data>

CODE - PUT /v2/<name>/blobs/uploads/<uuid>?digest=<digest>
Content-Length: <size of chunk>
Content-Range: <start of range>-<end of range>
Content-Type: application/octet-stream

<Last Layer Chunk Binary Data>
CODE - GET /v2/_catalog?n=<n from the request>&last=<last repository value from previous response>
CODE - GET /v2/<name>/tags/list?n=<n from the request>&last=<last tag value from previous response>
H6 - On Failure: Too Many Requests
H6 - On Failure: No Such Repository Error
H6 - On Failure: Too Many Requests
CODE - GET /v2/<name>/tags/list?n=<integer>&last=<last tag value from previous response>

CODE - 200 OK
Content-Length: <length>
Link: <<url>?n=<last n value>&last=<last entry from response>>; rel="next"
Content-Type: application/json

{
    "name": <name>,
    "tags": [
        <tag>,
        ...
    ],
}

CODE - 200 OK
Content-Length: <length>
Docker-Content-Digest: <digest>
Content-Type: application/octet-stream

<blob binary data>
H6 - On Failure: No Such Repository Error
H6 - On Failure: Too Many Requests

CODE - GET /v2/<name>/blobs/<digest>
Host: <registry host>
Authorization: <scheme> <token>
Range: bytes=<start>-<end>
H6 - On Failure: Requested Range Not Satisfiable
H6 - On Failure: No Such Repository Error
H6 - On Failure: Too Many Requests
H6 - On Failure: Invalid Name or Digest
H6 - On Failure: Method Not Allowed
H6 - On Failure: No Such Repository Error
H6 - On Failure: Too Many Requests

CODE - POST /v2/<name>/blobs/uploads/?digest=<digest>
Host: <registry host>
Authorization: <scheme> <token>
Content-Length: <length of blob>
Content-Type: application/octet-stream

<binary data>
H6 - On Failure: Invalid Name or Digest
H6 - On Failure: No Such Repository Error
H6 - On Failure: Too Many Requests

CODE - POST /v2/<name>/blobs/uploads/
Host: <registry host>
Authorization: <scheme> <token>
Content-Length: 0
H6 - On Failure: Invalid Name or Digest
H6 - On Failure: No Such Repository Error
H6 - On Failure: Too Many Requests

CODE - POST /v2/<name>/blobs/uploads/?mount=<digest>&from=<repository name>
Host: <registry host>
Authorization: <scheme> <token>
Content-Length: 0
H6 - On Failure: Invalid Name or Digest
H6 - On Failure: No Such Repository Error
H6 - On Failure: Too Many Requests
H6 - On Failure: No Such Repository Error
H6 - On Failure: Too Many Requests

CODE - PATCH /v2/<name>/blobs/uploads/<uuid>
Host: <registry host>
Authorization: <scheme> <token>
Content-Type: application/octet-stream

<binary data>
H6 - On Failure: No Such Repository Error
H6 - On Failure: Too Many Requests

CODE - PATCH /v2/<name>/blobs/uploads/<uuid>
Host: <registry host>
Authorization: <scheme> <token>
Content-Range: <start of range>-<end of range, inclusive>
Content-Length: <length of chunk>
Content-Type: application/octet-stream

<binary chunk>
H6 - On Failure: Requested Range Not Satisfiable
H6 - On Failure: No Such Repository Error
H6 - On Failure: Too Many Requests

CODE - PUT /v2/<name>/blobs/uploads/<uuid>?digest=<digest>
Host: <registry host>
Authorization: <scheme> <token>
Content-Length: <length of data>
Content-Type: application/octet-stream

<binary data>
H6 - On Failure: No Such Repository Error
H6 - On Failure: Too Many Requests

CODE - DELETE /v2/<name>/blobs/uploads/<uuid>
Host: <registry host>
Authorization: <scheme> <token>
Content-Length: 0
H6 - On Failure: No Such Repository Error
H6 - On Failure: Too Many Requests
CODE - GET /v2/_catalog?n=<integer>&last=<last repository value from previous response>

CODE - 200 OK
Content-Length: <length>
Link: <<url>?n=<last n value>&last=<last entry from response>>; rel="next"
Content-Type: application/json

{
	"repositories": [
		<name>,
		...
	],
	"next": "<url>?last=<name>&n=<last value of n>"
}
